name: LORDS
description: $LORDS is the native token of the Realmverse. The Realms + Bibliotheca team is building a massively multiplayer strategy game on StarkNet. Realms are part of the greater Loot ecosystem. $LORDS will be the token on StarkNet that users will transact with on a native AMM and NFT marketplace. $LORDS will be emitted to active participants within the game The game is in active development and the $LORDS token is currently being distributed to holders of the Realms NFTs before the main launch of the game.
